list: Standard Deduction - initial amount that is not taxed (set by IRS)
Marginal Tax Brackets - the rates in the table at the right
Maximal Marginal Tax Rate - the highest bracket youâ€™re paying in
Effective Tax Rate - percentage of your total income paid
Taxable Income - taxed now and investments are also taxed
Tax Deferred Income - the taxes on this income are deferred until your retirement
You are allowed to put up to $19,500 in your 401k contribution in 2020
Tax Free Income - the taxes on this income are paid now, but the investment gains on that income are not taxed as the investment increases over the years
You are allowed to put up to $6,000 in your Roth IRA contribution in 2020
